original_text: Now John also was baptizing at Aenon near Salim, because there was plenty of water, and people were coming and being baptized.
korean_text: 요한도 살렘 가까운 애논에서 세례를 베푸니 거기 물이 많음이라 그러므로 사람들이 와서 세례를 받더라

sentences.original_text: Now John also was baptizing at Aenon near Salim
sentences.korean_translation: 요한도 살림 가까운 아에논에서 세례를 베풀고 있었다

sentences.original_text: because there was plenty of water
